text: As a customer I need to reset my password on mobile without calling support, and I expect an email or SMS confirmation once it is done.
rationale: Common self-service flow touching auth UI plus outbound comms.

text: As a loan officer I want the system to auto-fetch refreshed bureau data before presenting cross-sell offers, so I don't miss risk flags.
As compliance I need multilingual rollout notifications for feature toggles, including WhatsApp and SMS for LATAM merchants.
rationale: Stress-test multi-channel messaging plus regional context.

text: As a customer I need to upload my ID photos from low-bandwidth rural areas without the app freezing.
rationale: Edge case around degraded networks and KYC artifacts.

text: As payments ops I need fewer false declines on 3DS so high-value card transactions stop failing during checkout.
rationale: Gateway + rule tuning scenario; checks precision under similar intents.

text: As finance I need a daily consolidated report that blends collections status with transaction history for auditors.
rationale: Cross-team reporting, ensures aggregations light up properly.

text: As branch KYC lead I want a single dashboard that shows which customers are waiting on manual review with SLA timers.
rationale: Human-in-loop workflow with surfaces for agents.

text: As dispute analysts we need auto-escalation when customers attach chargeback letters so collections is notified instantly.
rationale: Tests chaining of dispute + collections + alerts.

text: As an integration engineer I need retries when the downstream core banking API times out so that transfers do not fail silently.
As CX lead I want proactive support tips surfaced in the customer portal even when there is no transaction context.
rationale: Intentionally ambiguous scenario to highlight uncertainty/coverage gap.
